brewery.name: Hopped Up Brewing Company
brewery.description:
Hopped Up Brewing is located on E. Sprague Avenue in Spokane Valley. The brewery includes a tasting room with seating, open Wednesday thru Saturday 2 pm to 9 pm.  Ask us to Hop Up your private events.
Steve Ewan, the owner/brewer at Hopped Up Brewing, is a fan of hot rods. The name Hopped Up is a reference to his love for beer as well as his appreciation of hopped-up cars. And then there’s the building. Hopped Up Brewing is located in a former International House of Pancakes (IHOP).  It’s all Hopped Up!!!
Steve has brewed up several different beers. Quality Cream Ale, High Performance Porter, and Raspberry Champale to name a few. We started out by pouring beer at the tasting room exclusively but but now distribute to local  establishments as well.
